Why hello there,

I'm Miguel Mota,
and I make stuff for the web.

About me

I specialize in XHTML/CSS, Javascript(jQuery) and PHP/SQL. Currently I am attenting RCC; getting my transter studies completed, and after I plan on majoring in computer science at CSUF. I have a little over a year of experience in doing what I do, so I'm somewhat of a newbie but am catching up fairly quick.

About the site

This is my playground where I experiment with new findings. You will find here my lifestream and a showcase of my work. Every once in a while I'll write a tutorial related to all things web in which I found interesting.

The site is powered by jekyll, a static-site generator, and github pages. The icons that I use are from the Pictos icon set created by the talented Drew Wilson. The font is from the Ubuntu font family.

To say hello reach me at hello@miguelmota.com. =]
